mapper.select: select u.id as userId, u.number, u.user_name, u.avatar, u.profile, CASE WHEN fans.userId IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS isFollowingMe, CASE WHEN followByme.userId IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS isFollowedByMe from follow f left join user u on f.follow_to = u.id left join (select u.id as userId from follow f left join user u on f.follow_form = u.id where f.follow_to = #{myUserId} and u.del_flag = 0 and f.del_flag = 0) fans on (fans.userId = u.id) left join (select u.id as userId from follow f left join user u on f.follow_to = u.id where f.follow_form = #{myUserId} and u.del_flag = 0 and f.del_flag = 0) followByme on followByme.userId = u.id where f.follow_form = #{userId} and u.del_flag = 0 and f.del_flag = 0;
